trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides functionality to format the value of an object into a string representation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The provider to use to format the value.

-or-

A null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$X xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The value of the current instance in the specified format.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
